keyword: how many calories in a honeycrisp apple
title: How Many Calories in a Honeycrisp Apple?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a honeycrisp apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Honeycrisp Apple?
assumptions: Medium Honeycrisp apple (~182 g), raw with skin, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, variety, and storage; values are averages. Check produce labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium Honeycrisp apple has ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium Honeycrisp apple.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g total carbs, including 4.4 g fiber and 19 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a honeycrisp apple low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.3 g total fat per medium apple, with no saturated or trans fat.

faqs.q: How much fiber from one honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: Approximately 4.4 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Does apple size affect calories in honeycrisp?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”small apples have ~71 kcal, large ~116 kcal; adjust based on weight.
